title: DirectX Issue
body: So after Champ Select into a normal game i got an unknown directx error message. i restarted the client and then my computer and kept geting the error. is anyone else getting this error or just me?

replies.body: The Direct X error is usually due to a graphics card update needing to happen! It's likely that they need a quick reinstall, since there was probably an update that took place and you didn't get it.  You can check out our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684) as well to give you a run down on how to do this.
